about_the_game:
"As long as I’m with you, even the smallest trivia becomes a story."

After ending a relationship, you find yourself living in a plant shop called Carol’s House, where you’re lucky enough to be hired by its mysterious owner, Carol.

In the form of a pixel character, you become roommates with three charming Furry characters: a shy art student, an outgoing firefighter, and a tsundere accountant. Over the course of three seasons, you develop deep bonds through seemingly ordinary daily trivia.

Game Overview:

"Trivia About You" tells the story of the everyday trivia shared by Furry characters living in Carol’s House. It’s a romance visual novel (AVG) filled with the charm of daily life.

Your choices throughout the story will strengthen your relationships with your roommates, though you never know which small decision might be the trivia that changes your life.

Game Features:

  • Replayability: With a rich, replayable story and high-quality illustrations, different routes to pursue, and random daily events, every playthrough offers something new, enhanced by beautiful CG art.

  • Multiple Endings: Your affection for the three main characters will lead to different endings depending on the trivia you encounter and the choices you make throughout the story.

  • Pixel Object Interaction: Interact with various pixel objects in the environment to uncover more trivia about the people around you.

  • Mini-Games: Experience the daily trivia of the plant shop through mini-games like watering and pruning. From time to time, customers will visit, and you’ll need to listen and meet their needs!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64bit only)

  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Trivia About You" is a romance visual novel about furry characters sharing meaningful moments in Carol’s House. After moving into the shop, you become roommates with three charming furry characters. Through daily life, from spring to autumn, you slowly build deeper connections with them.
